events.message: We have successfully received your application for the Software Engineer position. Our hiring team will review your resume carefully and get back to you shortly with the next steps.
Your application has been categorized under the Engineering department, specifically for the Software Developer role focusing on backend services and API design.
A dedicated recruiter has been assigned to your case. You can reach out to Sarah Mitchell for any questions or clarifications about the recruitment process or your application status.

Your profile passed the initial screening round where we evaluated your technical skills and experience in software development. We are impressed with your background and would like to proceed further.
Thank you for confirming your availability for the upcoming interviews. Your enthusiasm and prompt communication are highly appreciated by our recruitment team.
We have scheduled your technical interview for May 18th at 3 PM UTC. The interview will focus on system design, coding challenges, and problem-solving skills.
You completed the technical interview successfully. The interviewers noted your strong grasp of algorithms and your ability to articulate complex solutions clearly.
Your HR interview is scheduled for May 21st at 11 AM UTC. This stage will cover cultural fit, career goals, and compensation expectations.
The HR interview went well. Our HR team is confident that you will integrate smoothly with our company culture and values.
We are excited to extend a formal offer for the Software Engineer position. Please review the attached document outlining your salary, benefits, and other terms.
We have received your feedback regarding the offer and are glad to hear that you find the compensation package and role interesting and aligned with your career aspirations.
Thank you for accepting our offer. We look forward to welcoming you aboard and will now begin the onboarding process to ensure a smooth start.
Your onboarding has officially started. You will receive access credentials, training schedules, and an introduction to your team shortly.
The recruitment case is now closed successfully. We are excited to have you join the engineering team and contribute to our projects and mission.
